container_attacks.escape_1: MATCH (c:Container:Docker {cont_id: $cont_id})-[:CAN]->(p:Permissions) WHERE 'sys_admin' IN p.capabilities AND 'mount' IN p.syscalls RETURN COUNT(c) > 0 UNION MATCH (c:Container:Docker {cont_id: $cont_id})-[:HAS]->(cc:ContainerConfig) WHERE 'root' IN cc.user RETURN COUNT(c) > 0
container_attacks.escape_2: MATCH (c:Container:Docker {cont_id: $cont_id})-[:CAN]->(p:Permissions) WHERE 'sys_module' IN p.capabilities RETURN COUNT(c) > 0 UNION MATCH (c:Container:Docker {cont_id: $cont_id})-[:HAS]->(cc:ContainerConfig) WHERE 'root' IN cc.user RETURN COUNT(c) > 0

kernel_attacks.CVE-2022-0492: MATCH (c:Container:Docker {cont_id: $cont_id})-[:CAN]->(p:Permissions) WHERE 'sys_admin' IN p.capabilities AND 'mount' IN p.syscalls AND 'unshare' IN p.syscalls RETURN COUNT(c) > 0 UNION MATCH (c:Container:Docker {cont_id: $cont_id})-[:HAS]->(cc:ContainerConfig) WHERE 'root' IN cc.user RETURN COUNT(c) > 0 UNION MATCH (h:Host)<-[:RUNS_ON_TOP]-(de:DockerEngine)-[:RUNS]->(c:Container:Docker {cont_id: $cont_id}) WHERE h.kernel_v < 5.17 RETURN COUNT(c) > 0
